about_the_game:
Step into a vibrant, epic world where magic and adventure await around every corner! This enchanting RPG blends a charming, cartoony art style with thrilling gameplay, inviting you to explore dungeons, master powerful skills, and engage in fast-paced sword combat while following an engaging story.





Charming World with a Cute Style: Immerse yourself in a beautifully stylized world where every character, creature, and environment bursts with personality and charm. The vibrant visuals and playful designs create a delightful backdrop for your epic adventure.



Skills and Swordplay: Whether you're mastering skills, shooting arrows or swinging your sword, combat is fluid, fun, and filled with flashy effects. Mix and match your abilities with melee skills to defeat a variety of dangerous enemies.



Exciting Dungeon Crawls: Venture into creatively designed dungeons brimming with puzzles, traps, and treasures. Each dungeon offers a unique challenge, from tricky platforming sections to brain-teasing riddles, all wrapped up in a whimsical package.



Engage in Quirky Side Quests: Meet a host of quirky characters with stories to tell and problems to solve. From rescuing lost items to helping a grumpy wizard find his missing hat, the world is full of charming side quests that add depth and humor to your journey.



Embark on a magical adventure where cuteness meets chaos. Will you uncover the secrets of the dungeons, outsmart your foes, and become the hero of this enchanting world?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6400 or AMD Phenom X2 Dual-Core GP-7730
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, 1GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Graphics: RX 480, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
